articles.title: How this new crazy invisibility tech can literally make you disappear - Fox News
articles.description: Tech guru Kurt "CyberGuy" Knutsson explains the science behind the Invisibility Shield, a 6-foot shield that makes people become invisible.
articles.content:
What would you think if I told you that there is technology available today that could make you vanish?
